aboutRootATL.heading: Join the ROOTS ATL Movement
aboutRootATL.subHeading: ROOTS ATL is a health company that supports, educates, and cares for people at every stage of their wellness journey.

overview.overviewContent: ROOTS ATL is a wellness e-commerce platform with a built-in referral system. Users can shop, subscribe to tiers, and earn commissions by referring others.

items.title: What is ROOTS ATL?
items.content1: Our flagship product combines cutting-edge technology with sleek design. Built with premium materials, it offers unparalleled performance and reliability.
items.content2: Key features include advanced processing capabilities, and an intuitive user interface designed for both beginners and experts.

items.title: How does the Roots ATL services work?
items.content1: We offer worldwide shipping through trusted courier partners. Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping ensures delivery within 1-2 business days.
items.content2: All orders are carefully packaged and fully insured. Track your shipment in real-time through our dedicated tracking portal.

items.title: Are my transactions secured?
items.content1: We stand behind our products with a comprehensive 30-day return policy. If you're not completely satisfied, simply return the item in its original condition.
items.content2: Our hassle-free return process includes free return shipping and full refunds processed within 48 hours of receiving the returned item.
